title: How to Bake Candy Dandies Cookies

steps.headline: Line baking sheets with parchment paper or Grease the baking pan with a small amount of butter.
Add the butter, brown sugar and egg to a mixing bowl.
Add the remaining ingredients and stir well.
steps.description: Be careful to not over mix as the candy bar pieces will blend into the cookie dough.

steps.headline: Drop cookie dough by teaspoonfuls about 2-inches apart on the prepared baking sheets.
Bake cookies about 10 minutes or until a light golden brown.
Allow the cookies to cool for a few minutes before removing them to wire cooling racks.

text: Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Line baking sheets with parchment paper or Grease the baking pan with a small amount of butter.  Add the butter, brown sugar and egg to a mixing bowl. Mix well. Add the remaining ingredients and stir well. Be careful to not over mix as the candy bar pieces will blend into the cookie dough. Drop cookie dough by teaspoonfuls about 2-inches apart on the prepared baking sheets.  Bake cookies about 10 minutes or until a light golden brown.  Allow the cookies to cool for a few minutes before removing them to wire cooling racks.  Finished.
